channel.title: Comments on: Moving on
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: David Forck (thirster42)
item.dc:creator: David Forck (thirster42)
item.description: Awesome Ted, congrats. Have fun in the new position!
item.content:encoded: Awesome Ted, congrats. Have fun in the new position!

item.title: By: Tahir Khalid
item.dc:creator: Tahir Khalid
item.content:encoded:
Congrats mate, I know what you mean about the family – not always, but sometimes you get a working environment that well, works.

People get on, have a good time and more importantly are passionate about what they do!

item.title: By: Alex Ullrich
item.dc:creator: Alex Ullrich
item.content:encoded:
Whew, I thought you were going to announce your retirement from blogging ðŸ˜‰

Congratulations, and good luck!

item.title: By: Janice Lee
item.dc:creator: Janice Lee
item.content:encoded:
Congratulations (again and again and again…)!

You keeping count? Agree with Meredith, it’s definitely worth saying again ðŸ˜›

item.title: By: Meredith Ryan-Smith
item.dc:creator: Meredith Ryan-Smith
item.description: I said it in Seattle, but it's worth saying again - Congrats and good luck!<br />
item.content:encoded: I said it in Seattle, but it’s worth saying again – Congrats and good luck!

item.title: By: Patrick
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description: Congrats, Ted! I guess Rose won't have to worry about those Nerf darts anymore, eh?
item.content:encoded: Congrats, Ted! I guess Rose won’t have to worry about those Nerf darts anymore, eh?

item.title: By: Matt Velic
item.dc:creator: Matt Velic
item.description: Congratulations! It's amazing how often it feels like this happens nowadays (community-job-hookups).
item.content:encoded: Congratulations! It’s amazing how often it feels like this happens nowadays (community-job-hookups).

item.title: By: Jack Corbett
item.dc:creator: Jack Corbett
item.description: Congrats on the new job. I hope that it works out well the way it worked.
item.content:encoded: Congrats on the new job. I hope that it works out well the way it worked.
